name: Impussible Kitty: Death Be Not Proud
name_original: Impussible Kitty: Death Be Not Proud
description:
Death is everywhere but Death be not proud.

Spam that Spacebar, time the Left-Right Arrows, and make that perfect jump. Dodge everything that kills you, collect Goldfishes to unlock the next sections and Krowns to unlock new areas.

Use button menus using LMB.

current version: Alpha 1.2 with 6 game levels and standby audio.

observed bug- Area 3 does not load with all obstacles but can be completed to reach Area 4.

future developments towards final release: More levels, final art and audio.
